alert.note: Alert for Burleigh; Dickey; Logan; McIntosh; McLean (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 26 at 11:51AM CST until December 27 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Some mixed precipitation is possible. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 8 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph with significant blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Burleigh, McLean, Dickey, Logan and McIntosh Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Near whiteout conditions are possible in rural areas.
info.instruction: Persons should delay travel if possible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
